What are the treatments for Coronary Heart Disease ?,"Treatments for coronary heart disease include heart-healthy lifestyle changes, medicines, medical procedures and surgery, and cardiac rehabilitation. Treatment goals may include:
                
Lowering the risk of blood clots forming (blood clots can cause a heart attack)
